title: Update Teams/New
body_html:
okay, so I think it would be great if we could distinguish between accepted teams and applying teams, since some of the features (such as team twitter account, github, blog url) really don't apply unless you are accepted as a team.

  • Name-> "Team name"
    hint: e.g. Anna & Jolanda, Team Unicorns etc. You can also change this later.
  • Description
    hint: Summary of your project(s) -> tell us about you
  • link is broken:
  • delete:

    and:
  • These fields I'd only show if the team is accepted:

and

and:

  • "add another team member" put this field right under the "Team Name" field
  • "Remove" -> Remove team member
  • Remove this Event-thingy:

body:
okay, so I think it would be great if we could distinguish between accepted teams and applying teams, since some of the features (such as team twitter account, github, blog url) really don't apply unless you are accepted as a team. 
- [x] Name-> "Team name"
  hint: e.g. Anna & Jolanda, Team Unicorns etc.  You can also change this later. 
- [x] Description 
  hint: Summary of your project(s) -> tell us about you 
- [x] link is broken: 
  ![screen shot 2015-03-02 at 14 10 11](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/1711357/6441211/e6a60bc6-c0e5-11e4-82c1-631702685d1c.png)
- [x] delete: 
  ![screen shot 2015-03-02 at 14 16 32](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/1711357/6441283/c6c4fdde-c0e6-11e4-9acd-bb9ac084ee01.png)
  and: 
  ![screen shot 2015-03-02 at 14 17 05](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/1711357/6441293/d71932b8-c0e6-11e4-80ad-ba3794c1d4cb.png)
- [x] These fields I'd only show if the team is accepted:
- [x]  ![screen shot 2015-03-02 at 14 17 43](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/1711357/6441313/f99bbea0-c0e6-11e4-9116-2a2b7c80b1e5.png)

and 
- [x] ![screen shot 2015-03-02 at 14 20 14](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/1711357/6441355/51ca0ac8-c0e7-11e4-9343-f78d31271733.png)

and:
- [x] ![screen shot 2015-03-02 at 14 22 36](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/1711357/6441381/9d8ce69c-c0e7-11e4-82f2-93be6d6847f9.png)
- [x] "add another team member" put this field right under the "Team Name" field 
- [x] "Remove" -> Remove team member
- [x] Remove this Event-thingy:
  ![screen shot 2015-03-02 at 14 27 06](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/1711357/6441470/82a427f4-c0e8-11e4-9bd2-38f357c2ecb7.png)
